description: This JSON file organizes cat reaction videos for use in Cursor. Each entry represents a specific cat emotion or action, mapped to a video file and a short description to help Cursor understand when to use each video.

cats.description: Cat appears to be actively talking or vocalizing with energy
Cat is relaxed, calm, and doing nothing in particular
Cat is casually talking or meowing
Cat looks happy, content, or excited
Cat appears sad or distressed, as if crying
Cat is loudly screaming or yelling
Cat looks angry, aggressive, or annoyed
Cat is dancing or moving rhythmically in a playful way
Cat walks with energy from side to side
Cat starts a motorcycle with energy
Cat starts a motorcycle with energy
Cat`s cleaning its purr and paws
